mapper.sql: id, username, password_hash, phone, vehicle_type, status, latitude, longitude, rating, completed_orders, total_earnings_cents, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO runners (username, password_hash, phone, vehicle_type, status, latitude, longitude, rating, completed_orders, total_earnings_cents, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{phone}, #{vehicleType,javaType=com.campusgo.enums.VehicleType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{status,javaType=com.campusgo.enums.RunnerStatus,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{rating}, #{completedOrders}, #{totalEarningsCents}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FROM runners ORDER BY id
SELECT FROM runners WHERE status = 'AVAILABLE' ORDER BY updated_at ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE runners SET phone = #{phone}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType,javaType=com.campusgo.enums.VehicleType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE runners SET status = #{status,javaType=com.campusgo.enums.RunnerStatus,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE runners SET latitude = #{lat}, longitude = #{lng}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
